dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, Kazakhstan's got a pretty generous May coming up in 2025, right? Three major national holidays.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Kazakhstan's got a pretty generous May coming up in twenty twenty five, right? Three major national holidays.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan celebrates three major national holidays in May: Each of these days is an official public holiday, so in addition to regular weekends, several extra days off will be added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and with a five-day workweek, that means twelve days off total. That's almost half the month!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and with a five-day workweek, that means twelve days off total. That's almost half the month!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With a five-day workweek, there will be 12 days off in May, including public holidays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And for people on a six-day schedule, it's still eight days off. But that gap between holidays—like from May 8th to the 11th—must feel a bit choppy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And for people on a six-day schedule, it's still eight days off. But that gap between holidays-like from May eighth to the eleventh-must feel a bit choppy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With a six-day workweek, there will be 8 days off, and 23 working days. Earlier, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection said there are no plans to move days off, including from May 11 to May 8, even though the gap between the holidays makes the break feel split up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The Ministry of Labor already said they won't move days around to smooth it out, even though it splits up the break.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Ministry of Labor already said they won't move days around to smooth it out, even though it splits up the break.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection said there are no plans to move days off, including from May 11 to May 8, even though the gap between the holidays makes the break feel split up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, because May isn't just about public holidays. There are all these professional observances too, even if they're not days off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, because May isn't just about public holidays. There are all these professional observances too, even if they're not days off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May is also rich in professional observances, which, although not official days off, are celebrated in various sectors:

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like the Ministry of Ecology is proposing a new one—Kazakh Dog Breeds Day on September 3rd. Kind of niche, but fun!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like the Ministry of Ecology is proposing a new one-Kazakh Dog Breeds Day on September third. Kind of niche, but fun!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the way, the Ministry of Ecology has prepared a draft order to amend the list of national observances in Kazakhstan. According to the document, it is planned to add Kazakh Dog Breeds Day on September 3.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the Ministry of Labor has been updating those professional holiday lists lately. I wonder how many new ones they've added.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the Ministry of Labor has been updating those professional holiday lists lately. I wonder how many new ones they've added.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection amended the order On the approval of the list of professional holidays. As a result, new commemorative dates were introduced in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Tengrinews.kz put together a whole calendar for planning, which is super handy with all these moving parts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: the website put together a whole calendar for planning, which is super handy with all these moving parts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tengrinews.kz has prepared a convenient calendar to help you plan in advance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Nineteen working days in May for most folks—not too shabby at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Nineteen working days in May for most folks-not too shabby at all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With a five-day workweek, there will be 12 days off in May, including public holidays. Citizens will work for 19 days that month.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely makes you look forward to spring!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely makes you look forward to spring!
